creation.title: Creating a Review
creation.description: A Review is an author's tour of a selected place. Here you can tell others about the location you visited, adding a description and attaching photos.

edit.title: Editing a Review
edit.description: After editing, the Review will be sent for moderation.

form.placeDescription: At this point, you need to select a Place from the drop-down list or create a new one.
form.photosDescription: Upload up to {{limit}} photos taken at this location in jpg, jpeg, png format.
form.reviewTitle: Come up with the title for the Review and describe the Place you visited.

update.success: The Review has been updated and sent for moderation.

create.success: The Review has been created and sent for moderation. You can see its status in your personal account
